short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create flashcards to help teachers learn student names and faces

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows teachers to create flashcards from a roster of students. Just navigate to your Blackbaud roster page, click on the app, and start learning!
If you miss a name, it will save it and quiz you again at the end.
